name: Sky King Soaring, LLC
about: Sky King Soaring LLC, based at Payson Airport (KPAN) in Payson, Arizona, offers scenic air tours and soaring rides amidst the picturesque pine country of Arizona. Owned and operated by Russ Hustead, the school specializes in personalized motorglider flight training using advanced aircraft like the Diamond Xtreme Motorglider. Sky King Soaring provides opportunities for both experienced pilots seeking a glider add-on rating and newcomers to experience the unique thrill of soaring. With a focus on safety and serenity, the school offers a unique flying experience that allows participants to enjoy Arizona's beauty silently and effortlessly. Whether you're looking for a leisurely flight or professional training, Sky King Soaring ensures a memorable and safe adventure.
